name: Mia
greetingText: Wishing a very happy birthday to my gorgeous lover <3
wishText: My darling, I never felt happiness until you came into my life. You mean the world to me. On this special day of yours, I pray for love, joy, peace, and happiness in your life. May Allah envelop you in special love and shower you with abundant blessings. Have a wonderful birthday, my love ;)
